sub_title: Researcher at Leiden Asia Centre & Japan Correspondent at NOS
summary: I am a researcher at the LeidenAsiaCentre at Leiden University, the Japan correspondent for Dutch National Broadcaster NOS, Nieuwsuur, Trouw and various other media, and a PhD graduate of the Osaka School of International Public Policy, Osaka University, specializing in government policy. I am currently responsible for projects focusing on East Asia, with an emphasis on Japan and North Korea. My research themes are (international) public policy in the fields of governance, health care, labor, technology, education, and human rights.
